mapper.select: SELECT * FROM volunteer V, area A, v_department D, centertb C WHERE V.vol_area = A.areano AND V.department = D.departmentno AND V.centerno = C.centerno AND V.volunteerno = #{volunteerno}
SELECT A.write_date, U.uphone, U.uname, U.uemail FROM usertb U, applicant A WHERE U.userno = A.userno AND A.volunteerno = #{volunteerno}
SELECT userno FROM usertb WHERE uemail=#{uemail}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO applicant (applicantno, volunteerno, userno) VALUES(applicant_seq.nextval, #{volunteerno}, #{userno} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM applicant WHERE volunteerno = #{volunteerno} AND userno= #{userno}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM applicant where volunteerno = #{volunteerno}
